On a Wednesday is a taking a few weeks off to focus on our new website. We'll be back soon with some surprises!

On a Wednesday

Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

Bettina

 Brooklyn Bridge

⏲ 11:22 a.m. on Wednesday, November 20

What are you doing today?

I’m going to check out Manhattan. I got here yesterday, so we’re walking here, then to check out the 9/11 Memorial. Hope to get some dim sum in Chinatown, then maybe walk the High Line. I’m a tourist.

What's your favorite part of the day?

Probably when I come home from work to see my girls. I have two girls. I get home from work, it’s been a decent day at the office. I get home and see them and disconnect for a few hours.

What are you doing tomorrow?

I’m going to go to the MoMA. Walk a little bit, see a bit of 5th Avenue and that whole area. Probably going to walk around the East Village. I’m not really sure, but I’ll definitely go see the MoMA.

Made in New York City by Dave Dawson & Bekka Palmer.
